name: Elif Lab
goal:
Elif Lab is a laboratory for studying, understanding and representing information and data.
Our interests range from the identification of online and offline networks to the study of political dynamics, from the exploration of the social media world to the optimization of e-commerce and customer care services, from text and video content analysis to the management of online communities.
We create web platforms, but also produce reports and visual display of data in order to understand, speculate and anticipate.
We are specialized in analyzing institutional and political data, creating tools and reports to anticipate scenarios, map stakeholders, identify and engage people for grassroots advocacy.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: We follow horizontally the work of the EP and of the other institutions, providing analyses and reports on their activity.
